=== About Me ===
Hi my name is '''Enrico Carafa''' and I'm from Italy. I like listening to music, expecially metal and rock. My favourite bands are: Dream Thetaer, Opeth, Pink Floyd, Genesis, Lamb of God, Symphony X and so on... 

I love Ubuntu. :P

=== Future Plans & Projects ===
I will continue to help the users on Launchpad. And I will start to help the users on <nowiki>[[http://www.askubuntu.com|AskUbuntu.com]]</nowiki>. In the next future I will try to learn about programming for contribute to Ubuntu with the bug fixing also. Maybe I will open a blog about Gnu/Linux and Ubuntu. :)

=== Contributions to the Ubuntu Community ===
I contribute to Ubuntu with the Answer Team on Launchpad. Every day I try to help users with problem with their system. I think that the support is essential for make Ubuntu bigger. I'm the 4th in the top contributor in the Answer category, <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+topcontributors|here]]</nowiki>, with approximately 44000 karma points and the 15th in the Overall list.

'''<nowiki>[[https://answers.launchpad.net/~mr.tennents|Here]]</nowiki>''' is all that I've done with this team.

I've also helped for some years the users on the italian forum of Ubuntu.
In the future I would like to enter in the official Ubuntu forum for give my support here also.
